title: StateConfiguration
description:
Defines the operational state and associated metadata for a session of an agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)

Started.title: Started
Started.description:
The moment when the agent AI is initiated.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-started-list

LastAccess.title: Last Access
LastAccess.description:
Last access to the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-lastaccess-list

IsStarted.title: Is Started
IsStarted.description:
Indicates whether the agent has been started.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-isstarted-list

ThreadId.title: Thread Id
ThreadId.description:
The identifier of the thread associated with the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-threadid

LlmConnectorName.title: LLM Connector Name
LlmConnectorName.description:
The name of the LLM connector associated with the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-llmconnectorname

PromptName.title: Prompt Name
PromptName.description:
The name of the currently active prompt associated with the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-promptname

Url.title: Url
Url.description:
The URL associated with the agent state.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-url

Language.title: Language
Language.description:
The language associated with the agent state.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-language

Description.description:
A brief description or details regarding the agent state.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-description

Variables.description:
A collection of variables associated with the agent state.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-variables-list

Name.title: Variable Name
Name.description:
The name of the variable.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-variables-list-name

Value.description:
The value of the variable.
